s.description: Near view. Vanilla default is 0.25, or 0.0 if you are under the effect of Fire Resistance.
s.markdownDescription: Near view. Vanilla default is 0.25, or 0.0 if you are under the effect of Fire Resistance.

v.description: Far view. Vanilla default is 1.0, or 3.0 if you are under the effect of Fire Resistance.
v.markdownDescription: Far view. Vanilla default is 1.0, or 3.0 if you are under the effect of Fire Resistance.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/lava_vision)

Changes how far the player can see when submerged in lava.

Type ID: `origins:lava_vision`
